items.title: Win a Google Assistant Tshirt and $200 in Google Cloud Credits
items.author: spshania
items.description:
A Google Assistant t-shirt and $200 Cloud Credits

Let’s make some actions

We are going to create a simple trivia from templates to get started.
The Trivia Action template lets you create Actions without writing a single line of code.

The template lets you choose a personality and specify the questions, answers, and configuration for the Action in a Google Sheet. Then, after completing these quick steps, you’ll have a fully working Action that you can test and submit for approval.

We are going to create a simple trivia from templates to get started.
The Trivia Action template lets you create Actions without writing a single line of code.
